commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basbf5f1cf"

diff:
"bf5f1cf bug 395019 - compute relativesrcdir from srcdir, topsrcdir.  r=bsmedberg a=bz
diff --git a/config/autoconf.mk.in b/config/autoconf.mk.in
index 7fc3bb8..11ba314 100644
--- a/config/autoconf.mk.in
+++ b/config/autoconf.mk.in
@@ -598,3 +598,5 @@ MOZ_V1_STRING_ABI = @MOZ_V1_STRING_ABI@
 MOZ_EMBEDDING_LEVEL_DEFAULT = @MOZ_EMBEDDING_LEVEL_DEFAULT@
 MOZ_EMBEDDING_LEVEL_BASIC = @MOZ_EMBEDDING_LEVEL_BASIC@
 MOZ_EMBEDDING_LEVEL_MINIMAL = @MOZ_EMBEDDING_LEVEL_MINIMAL@
+
+relativesrcdir = $(subst $(topsrcdir)/,,$(srcdir))
"
